message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think.
I'm interested in the product, but $115 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $100 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $105.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $102.50. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
